66152.name: Female to Male log Wage Ratio (Blau and Kahn (2017))
66152.description: The unadjusted wage ratio is the mean female to male log hourly wage ratio for full-time workers. The adjusted female to male wage ratios decompose differences in log wages into a portion accounting for differences due to characteristics, and the other due to an unexplained component - often cited to be discrimination.
66152.datasetName: Decomposition of Gender Wage Gap 1980 - Blau and Kahn (2017)

source.name: Blau and Kahn (2017)
source.dataPublishedBy: Blau, Francine D., and Lawrence M. Kahn (2017). "The Gender Wage Gap: Extent, Trends, and Explanations." Journal of Economic Literature, 55(3): 789-865.
source.dataPublisherSource: Blau and Kahn's calculations based on data from the PSID (Michigan Panel Study of Income Dynamics)
source.additionalInfo: See the authors' data appendix for more detail on how the data was prepared and analyzed.
